OptionPackage.DisplayName: SINAMICS Startdrive G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210
SINAMICS Startdrive G110M, G120, G120C, G120D, G120P, G115D

AttributeList.Text: //////////UNIT 01 HOPERS CONTROLS//////////
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL UPPER HOPPER 1 UNIT 01
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL LOWER HOPPER 1 UNIT 01
CALL FB22502 MOTOR STIRRER CONTROL HOPPER 1 UNIT 01
CALL FB22503 HOPPER COVER PRESSURE CONTROL HOPPER 1 UNIT 01
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL UPPER HOPPER 2 UNIT 01
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL LOWER HOPPER 2 UNIT 01
CALL FB22502 MOTOR STIRRER CONTROL HOPPER 2 UNIT 01
CALL FB22503 HOPPER PRESSURE CONTROL HOPPER 2 UNIT 01
//////////UNIT 02 HOPERS CONTROLS//////////
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL UPPER HOPPER 1 UNIT 02
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL LOWER HOPPER 1 UNIT 02
CALL FB22502 MOTOR STIRRER CONTROL HOPPER 1 UNIT 02
CALL FB22503 HOPPER PRESSURE CONTROL HOPPER 1 UNIT 02
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL UPPER HOPPER 2 UNIT 02
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL LOWER HOPPER 2 UNIT 02
CALL FB22502 MOTOR STIRRER CONTROL HOPPER 2 UNIT 02
CALL FB22503 HOPPER PRESSURE CONTROL HOPPER 2 UNIT 02
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL UPPER HOPPER 3 UNIT 02
CALL FB22501 TEMPERATURE JKT CONTROL LOWER HOPPER 3 UNIT 02
CALL FB22502 MOTOR STIRRER CONTROL HOPPER 3 UNIT 02
CALL FB22503 HOPPER PRESSURE CONTROL HOPPER 3 UNIT 02
FC22500 HOPPER SYSTEM CONTROLS
